phrases: Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
On the nights I cannot sleep
Within the vast world, a single seed
and put out a fruit that was still unripe.
The fruit that I wish would turn orange soon
The ideals and dreams just swell -
Today, I tried eating an orange
but it was so sour I cried.
I could not leave it behind like I have been
I love it I feel like crying.
I love it I love it.
Is not Takasu here with you?
Ryuuji got sick and was hospitalised right before New Year's.
He is still at home sick right now.
I should go and visit him later -
I ended up sleeping through the whole winter break.
W-Why did you close it again all of a sudden?!
You are eating junk food again...
Since you are so annoying, I will eat it right in front of you.
I have cooked for you every single day!
Why have not you come over since New Year's?
Do not get mad at me just because Minorin rejected you.
It is not like I want you to pity me.
Just treat me like you usually do!
I am doing this for the sake of you and Minorin.
I said I would support Minorin,
but I always just crash at your place.
It is only natural for her to misunderstand.
So you think that is why she rejected me?
I think she just does not feel that w -
No, I think Minorin likes you,
but she probably thinks I need you.
Do you really think Minorin does not like you?
I get the feeling she is kind of interested in me...
I will not come over anymore.
I do not need your cooking.
You do not need to wake me up every morning.
I will try my best by myself.
If you still feel the same about Minorin,
I am sure she will change her mind.
That is why you should do what you should do!
Do not run away from Minorin!
You have to confirm her true feelings.
do not burn down your apartment.
Yeah, I promise I will not use the stove.
I hereby declare that I will only eat fast food!
Sheesh, I wonder how long you will last.
I even stamped it for you.
So you are really going to Okinawa...
This is not the time for me to care about this...
When I see Kushieda, the first thing I will do is greet her.
I wanted to return this to you as soon as possible since it looked really expensive.
I am sorry, I totally forgot about it.
this was in the pocket the whole time.
I did not end up needing it that night.
Six days and five nights in Okinawa!
It is because you were bothering me with your chinsuko crap!
I do not need it anymore.
How does it look on me?
I see you guys are all hyped up for the new semester!
I am going to buy some juice!
I wish everything would just burn down.
However, the field trip will not be cancelled,
It will go as planned, okay?
Sensei, I do not understand what you are talking about!
The hotel we were going to stay at in Okinawa burned down.
The field trip will now be a ski trip for three days and two nights.
It is not like I burned the hotel down.
Why is Ami-chan late on a day like this?!
If Ami-chan were here, she would definitely have a plan!
She could not make it back for today.
But since she is already spent a lot of time in the southern islands,
she would probably want to go to a snowy mountain.
Yeah, Taiga said she had something to do.
I will try my best by myself.
If you still feel the same about Minorin...
She is even living on cup noodles for my sake.
Are not you supposed to be working in Hawaii?
How can you be picking a fight when we have not even seen each other recently?
I hate you because you are an idiot.
We were supposed to meet ten minutes ago!
Do not be so picky, Stupid Chihuahua.
Here, this is what you were looking for.
So you guys are already friendly enough to exchange gifts.
I paid for it, so it is not actually a gift.
I will just wear it when I feel like it.
Are not you going to take it with you to Okinawa?
The field trip is now a ski trip for three days and two nights.
They said the hotel in Okinawa burned down.
I have something to tell you before the trip.
Listen up, do not hang around Ryuuji during the trip.
It would bother me to hang around him.
You know, Ryuuji was rejected by Minorin on Christmas Eve.
Actually, it was right before I was going to confess.
She rejected me by hinting that I should not confess!
You know, Minorin really likes Ryuuji,
but for some reason, things are not moving along well.
We will have exams once we are seniors, and we will be in different classes.
This field trip is his last chance to confirm Minorin's feelings.
I am fine with it if you are.
Hopefully you are the only one getting hurt.
W-What is that supposed to mean?
Someone as stupid as you could never understand.
Hey, why are you following me?!
I have to go this way...
I never thought you would go that far for Kushieda and me.
I will do my best on the field trip.
Perhaps confirming Kushieda's feelings would be a waste of effort, but -
You and Minorin like each other.
Seriously, it will be all right.
Hey, where did you get all that confidence?
I have a reason to believe in that.
In other words, I believe in you.
You are capable of becoming Minori's lover.
All right, I am going to the train station.
There is a new convenience store there.
What was with that attitude today?
If I do not move forward...
How should I put it... I am sorry.
It was not even on my mind.
Well then, I am going first.
You have to take care of this since you got caught!
What the heck is wrong with her?
Damn that Taiga, damn that Taiga, damn that -
No, I am totally all right with it.
Come on, let me hold a side.
By the way, your hair looks different.
I cut the front a bit shorter.
Actually, I wanted to cut it so short that even berries could grow on it.
I always had a buzz cut when I was in elementary school.
I would just sit at the barber's with my younger brother,
and they would just rip my hair off with clippers.
My nickname back then was Mr. Lady.
I am surprised that you noticed, though.
Well, that is because I always look at you.
That is right, I have to move forward.
Speaking of which, your brother plays high school baseball, right?
Yeah, his school frequently visits Koshien.
Wow, I would be proud of him if I were you.
To be honest, I am a bit jealous of him...
No, I did not see her.
What do you mean by oh my?
All right, the groups for the field trip are decided.
Do not you think this grouping is really weird?
You, Ami, Kashii, Aisaka, Kushieda, Takasu, Noto, Haruta, and myself.
It is a mixture of nine boys and girls.
Since we have more girls, I think this is a good grouping.
B-But you and Taiga will be -
But if that is the case...
If you are not happy about it, go join another group.
You are annoying, so I told you to shut up!
How could you tell me to shut up?!
If you do not want to, you can go join -
I said that is not the case!
See, even Master Kitamura said that.
Why do you have to say such things?!
We need to make a guidebook?
Yeah, each group needs to turn it in by next week.
Why do we have to do something so troublesome?
I think it would be easier if we worked together on it.
How about my place on Sunday?
Yeah, my place is pretty big.
I-Is not this place a bit over the top?
I wonder how much the rent is.
Takasu, do you live next door?
Takasu-kun, you live in this mansion?
I live in an apartment next to this building.
I brought a few examples from previous field trips for reference.
I will go make some black tea.
I also brought some madeleines over.
Aisaka, I need to use the computer.
By the way, you can talk to Kitamura normally now?
You should not really care about it, just go and help Minorin.
I am the one behind you...
It is weird that there is usable tableware in Taiga's house.
The last time I came here was during our freshman year,
so I got the wrong idea.
This must be thanks to you.
No, I have not been doing anything lately.
Taiga did this all by herself.
The reason she is able to do it is because you are here.
You have not been here since freshman year?
Yeah, because of the stuff with her dad.
Since then, I would not come here unless I had a reason to.
I was afraid of failing, so I did not know what to do.
you did a good job, Takasu-kun!
You were not afraid of failing, and you stepped in here.
Do you think it would be all right if we just copied this?
Why would we copy an Okinawa guide when we are going to a snowy mountain?
Oh my, we cannot show Yuusaku this.
I do not think you should worry about it.
You are just making me more curious!
Wow, I guess it must be a big shock.
It is just a picture, but that magnificent rejection -
Stupid! Stupid! Stupid! Stupid! Stupid Chi'!
Blame the person who brought this here.
Sheesh, be nice to each other.
Actually, I am kind of looking forward to this field trip.
Well, I mean, it is the last time our class will be doing something together.
I will be lonely without it.
If only we could stay like this forever...
If only we could stay like this...
That is right, I cannot stay like this forever.
I have to confirm Kushieda's true feelings on the field trip.
Meidosan no hesonogoma (A maid's belly button fluff).
Mandoragora no benishuuga (Mandrake red pickled ginger).
Actually, wasted effort is bitter in a sense, is not it?
Sukyatto suru Nigamigawa Shibuhiko (Scat-singing Nigamigawa Shibuhiko)!
That is right, I have to do my best...
even if it is for the sake of Taiga who is supporting me.
I do not say what I mean.
